00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )
00034 
00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00077 static double R_INLINE sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00078 {
00079     double ans = 0;
00080     int i;
00081 
00082     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00083     return ans;
00084 }
00085 
00094 static int R_INLINE Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00095 {
00096     int i;
00097     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00098     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00099     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00100 }

00113 static double R_INLINE
00114 *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00115 {
00116     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00117     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00118 }

00128 static double R_INLINE
00129 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* deviance)
00130 {
00131     double sigma = 1;
00132 
00133     if (dims[useSc_POS])
00134         sigma =
00135             sqrt((deviance[wrss_POS] + deviance[usqr_POS])/
00136                  ((double)(dims[n_POS] -
00137                            (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))));
00138     return sigma;
00139 }

00149 static double
00150 chm_log_det2(CHM_FR L)
00151 {
00152     double ans = 0;
00153     int i;
00154 
00155     if (L->is_super) {
00156         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00157             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00158                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00159             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00160 
00161             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00162                 ans += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00163             }
00164         }
00165     } else {
00166         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00167         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00168         
00169         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00170             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00171             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00172             ans += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00173         }
00174     }
00175     return ans;
00176 }

00191 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00192 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00193 {
00194     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00195 
00196     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00197         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00198         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00199 
00200         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00201         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00202         nc[i] = nci;
00203         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00204     }
00205     return ans;
00206 }
00207 
00222 static int
00223 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00224        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00225 {
00226     int ans, i, p;
00227 
00228     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00229     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00230         int zrow = zi[p];
00231         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00232 
00233         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00234         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00235             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00236             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00237                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00238         }
00239     }
00240     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00241     return ans;
00242 }
00243 
00259 static void
00260 TSPp_dense_mult(double *dx, int nf, int m, int n, double **st,
00261                 const int *nc, const int *nlev, const int *Gp,
00262                 const double *sx, const int *Perm)
00263 {
00264     int i, j, k;
00265     double *tmp = Alloca(m, double), one = 1;
00266     R_CheckStack(); 
00267 
00268     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00269                                 /* apply permutation if given */
00270         if (Perm) for (i = 0; i < m; i++) tmp[Perm[i]] = sx[j * m + i];
00271         else Memcpy(tmp, sx + j * m, m);
00272         for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00273             for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00274                 double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00275                 int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00276                 for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) tmp[base + kk] *= dd;
00277             }
00278             if (nc[i] > 1) {    /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00279                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00280                                 st[i], nc + i, tmp + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00281             }
00282         }
00283         Memcpy(dx + j * m, tmp, m);
00284     }
00285 }

00297 static void
00298 TSPp_SEXP_mult(SEXP dest, SEXP ST, const int *Gp, SEXP src, const int *Perm)
00299 {
00300     int isM = isMatrix(src), nf = LENGTH(ST);
00301     int m = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[0] : LENGTH(src),
00302         n = isM ? INTEGER(getAttrib(src, R_DimSymbol))[1] : 1;
00303     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00304     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00305     R_CheckStack(); 
00306 
00307     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00308     TSPp_dense_mult(REAL(dest), nf, m, n, st, nc, nlev, Gp, REAL(src), Perm);
00309 }
00310 
00320 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00321 {
00322     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00323         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00324         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00325         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00326     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00327         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00328     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00329         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00330         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00331     R_CheckStack();
00332     
00333     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00334     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00335     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00336     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00337         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00338         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00339             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00340             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00341                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00342             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00343         }
00344     }
00345     return R_NilValue;
00346 }
00347 
00356 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00357 {
00358     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00359     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00360     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00361         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00362         double *st = REAL(STi);
00363         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00364         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00365 
00366         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00367             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00368         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00369             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00370                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00371     }
00372     return pars;
00373 }

00382 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00383 {
00384     SEXP ans =
00385         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00386                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00387     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00388     UNPROTECT(1); 
00389     return ans;
00390 }
00391 
00399 static void
00400 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00401 {
00402     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00403     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00404     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym)),
00405         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00406     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00407         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00408         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00409     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00410     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00411     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00412         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00413         one[] = {1,0};
00414     R_CheckStack();
00415 
00416     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00417                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00418     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00419         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00420         double *sti = st[i];
00421 
00422         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00423             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00424         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00425             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00426                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00427     }
00428                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00429                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00430     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00431     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00432         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00433         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00434             int pv = vp[j];
00435             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00436                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00437                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00438                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00439                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00440             }
00441         }
00442     }
00443                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00444     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00445         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00446             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00447                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00448 
00449                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00450                 else {
00451                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00452                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00453                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00454                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00455                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00456                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00457                 }
00458             }
00459                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00460     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00461         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00462         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00463     }
00464 }

00475 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
00476 {
00477     int npar = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS];
00478 
00479     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00480         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00481     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00482     return R_NilValue;
00483 }

00493 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00494 {
00495     int w = asInteger(which);
00496                 
00497     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && isREML(x)),
00498                                 INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00499                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00500 }
00501 
00510 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x, SEXP uS)
00511 {
00512     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00513         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00514     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00515     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00516     int i, j, k;
00517     double *vv, one[] = {1,0},
00518         sc = asLogical(uS) ?
00519              get_sigma(isREML(x), dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)))
00520             : 1;
00521     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00522     CHM_DN dm1;
00523     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00524     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00525         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00526     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00527     R_CheckStack();
00528 
00529     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00530     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00531     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00532         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00533         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00534                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00535                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00536 
00537         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00538         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00539         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00540         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00541             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00542         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00543             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00544             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00545                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i]];
00546             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00547             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00548             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00549             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00550             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00551             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00552             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00553             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00554             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00555                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00556                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00557                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00558                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00559             }
00560         }
00561         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00562     }
00563     UNPROTECT(1);
00564     return ans;
00565 }
00566 
00574 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP C)
00575 {
00576     double one[] = {1, 0};
00577     int fll = c.final_ll;
00578     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(C);
00579     CHM_FR L;
00580     R_CheckStack();
00581 
00582     c.final_ll = 1;
00583     L = M_cholmod_analyze(cC, &c);
00584     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(cC, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00585         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00586               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00587     c.final_ll = fll;
00588 
00589     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00590 }

00593 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00594 
00595 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00596 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00597 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00598 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00599 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;

00601 
00611 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00612 {
00613     SEXP X = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
00614         moff = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00615         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00616     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00617     int i, ione = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS];
00618     int nans = n * dims[s_POS];
00619     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00620         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00621         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00622         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00623         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00624         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00625         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00626         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00627         one[] = {1,0};
00628     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00629     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00630     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, nans, 1),
00631         cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym));
00632     R_CheckStack();
00633 
00634                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00635     if (LENGTH(moff)) Memcpy(eta, REAL(moff), nans);
00636     else AZERO(eta, nans);
00637                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00638     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &nans, &p, one, REAL(X), &nans,
00639                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &ione,
00640                     one, eta, &ione);
00641                                 /* eta := eta + V P' u */
00642     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00643     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00644         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00645     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00646 
00647     if (LENGTH(v)) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00648         SEXP rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym);
00649         SEXP gg, pnames = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pnamesSym), vv;
00650         int *gdims, s = dims[s_POS];
00651         
00652         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00653             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00654                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00655             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00656                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00657                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00658             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00659         }
00660         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00661         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00662             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00663         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00664         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00665             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00666         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00667         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00668             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00669                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00670                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00671                                  * pnames has been checked */
00672         SET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym, vv);
00673         UNPROTECT(1);
00674         eta = REAL(vv);
00675     }
00676                                 /* eta now points to an n vector  */
00677     if (muEta) {        /* apply the generalized linear part */
00678         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00679         case 1:                 /* binomial with logit link */
00680             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00681                 double etai = eta[i];
00682                 double tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00683                     ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00684                 mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00685                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00686             }
00687             break;
00688         case 2:                 /* binomial with probit link */
00689             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00690                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00691                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00692             }
00693             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00694                 double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00695                 mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00696                     ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00697                      pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00698                 var[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00699                 tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00700                 muEta[i] =
00701                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00702             }
00703             break;
00704         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00705             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00706                 double tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00707                 muEta[i] = var[i] = mu[i] =
00708                     (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00709             }
00710             break;
00711         default:
00712             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00713         } 
00714     } else {
00715         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00716     }
00717 
00718     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00719     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00720         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (swt ? swt[i] : 1);
00721         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00722     }
00723                                 /* store u'u */
00724     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00725     
00726     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00727 }
00728 
00739 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00740 {
00741     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00742 }
00743 
00754 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00755 {
00756     SEXP vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
00757     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00758     int j, jv, lv = LENGTH(vP),
00759         n = dims[n_POS], p, s = dims[s_POS];
00760     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00761         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00762         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00763         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00764         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
00765         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00766         one[] = {1,0};
00767     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00768     CHM_SP A = C;
00769     int *ai = (int*) NULL, *ap = (int*) NULL,
00770         *vi = (int*) C->i, *vp = (int*) C->p;
00771     double *ax = (double*) NULL, *vx = (double*) C->x;
00772     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00773     R_CheckStack();
00774 
00775     if (lv || muEta || swt) {   /* must generate A from C */
00776         A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00777         R_CheckStack();
00778         ai = (int*)(A->i); ap = (int*)(A->p); ax = (double*)(A->x);
00779         
00780         if (lv) { /* apply the gradient from the nonlinear model */
00781             double *grad = REAL(getAttrib(vP, lme4_gradientSym));
00782             
00783             AZERO(ax, ap[n]);
00784             for (jv = 0; jv < n * s; jv++) {
00785                 int iv, ja = jv % n, ia;
00786                 for (iv = vp[jv]; iv < vp[jv + 1]; iv++) {
00787                     for (ia = ap[ja]; ia < ap[ja + 1]; ia++)
00788                         if (ai[ia] == vi[iv]) break;
00789                     if (ia == ap[ja + 1])
00790                         error(_("Structure of A incompatible with C, jv = %d, iv = %d"),
00791                               jv, iv);
00792                     ax[ia] += grad[jv] * vx[iv];
00793                 }
00794             }
00795         } else {                /* copy contents of C to A */
00796             Memcpy(ax, vx, ap[n]);
00797         }
00798 
00799         if (swt) {              /* update swt and res. Apply swt and,
00800                                  * if used, muEta to A */
00801             double *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
00802                 *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym);
00803             d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00804             for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00805                 swt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / (var ? var[j] : 1));
00806                 res[j] = swt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00807                 d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00808                 for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00809                     ax[p] *= (muEta ? muEta[j] : 1) * swt[j];
00810             }
00811         }
00812     }
00813 
00814     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00815         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00816               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00817     d[ldL2_POS] = chm_log_det2(L);
00818     return d[wrss_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00819 }
00820 
00832 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00833 {
00834     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00835 }
00836 
00838 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00839 
00840 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00841 
00842 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00843 
00853 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00854 {
00855     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00856     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00857     double
00858         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00859         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym)),
00860         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00861         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, one[] = {1,0},
00862         step, zero[] = {0,0};
00863     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double),
00864         *uold = Alloca(q, double);
00865     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00866     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00867         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00868     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00869     R_CheckStack();
00870 
00871     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00872     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00873 
00874     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
00875      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
00876      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
00877      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
00878 
00879     AZERO(u, q);
00880     update_mu(x);
00881     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
00882 
00883         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
00884         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
00885                                 /* tmp := A %*% W^{1/2} %*% (y-mu) */
00886         if (!(M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 0 /* no trans */, one, zero,
00887                                cres, ctmp, &c))) 
00888             error(_("cholmod_sdmult returned error code"));
00889                                 /* tmp := P %*% tmp - u */
00890         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_P, L, ctmp, &c);
00891         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] = ((double*)(sol->x))[j] - u[j];
00892         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00893                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
00894         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
00895             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
00896         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00897         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00898                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
00899         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
00900         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
00901                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
00902         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
00903             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
00904         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00905         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00906 
00907         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
00908             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
00909             pwrss = update_mu(x);
00910             if (verb < 0)
00911                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
00912                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
00913             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
00914                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
00915                 break;
00916             }
00917         }
00918         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
00919     }
00920     return i;
00921 }
00922 
00934 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
00935 {
00936     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
00937 }
00938 
00947 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00948 {
00949     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00950 }
00951 
00959 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
00960 {
00961     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
00962     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00963     int i, n = dims[n_POS];
00964 
00965     d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
00966     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) { /* generalized */
00967         SEXP pwtp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym);
00968         int pw = LENGTH(pwtp);
00969         double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00970             *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00971             *wts = REAL(pwtp),
00972             *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym));
00973 
00974         d[disc_POS] = 0;
00975         switch(dims[fTyp_POS]) {
00976         case 1:               /* binomial with logit or probit link */
00977         case 2:
00978             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00979                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00980                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00981                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00982             }
00983             break;
00984         case 3:                 /* Poisson with log link */
00985             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00986                 double mui = mu[i], yi = y[i];
00987                 d[disc_POS] += 2 * (pw ? wts[i] : 1) *
00988                     (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00989             }
00990             break;
00991         default:
00992             error(_("General form of glmer_dev_resids not yet written"));
00993         }
00994     }
00995 
00996     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
00997     return R_NilValue;
00998 }
00999 
01008 SEXP mer_update_effects(SEXP x)
01009 {
01010     SEXP muEta = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01011         v = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym);
01012     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01013     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01014     R_CheckStack();
01015 
01016     if (!(LENGTH(muEta) || LENGTH(v))) { /* linear mixed model */
01017         SEXP uvec = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01018         int ione = 1, p = dims[p_POS], pp1 = dims[p_POS] + 1,
01019             q = dims[q_POS];
01020         double *RXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01021             *RVXy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01022             *dev = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01023             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01024             *u = REAL(uvec), mone = -1, one = 1;
01025         CHM_DN cu = AS_CHM_DN(uvec), sol;
01026         R_CheckStack();
01027 
01028         Memcpy(fixef, RXy + p * pp1, p);
01029         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RXy, &pp1, fixef, &ione);
01030         Memcpy(u, RVXy + p * q, q);
01031         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, RVXy, &q,
01032                         fixef, &ione, &one, u, &ione);
01033         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
01034             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
01035         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01036         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01037         dev[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
01038         dev[disc_POS] = exp(dev[lpdisc_POS]) - dev[usqr_POS];
01039     }
01040     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01041                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01042                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
01043                    GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01044                    (int *)L->Perm);
01045     return R_NilValue;
01046 }
01047 
01059 SEXP mer_create_C(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01060 {
01061     SEXP ans;
01062     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01063         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01064     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01065     R_CheckStack();
01066 
01067                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01068     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01069         return duplicate(Zt);
01070                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01071     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01072     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01073     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01074     R_CheckStack();
01075 
01076     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01077     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01078     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01079         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01080         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01081     }
01082     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01083                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01084     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01085     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01086     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01087                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01088     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01089     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01090     vp[0] = 0;
01091     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01092     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01093                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01094     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01095     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01096     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01097         int i, pos = vp[j];
01098         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01099         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01100     }
01101                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01102     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01103     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01104 
01105     UNPROTECT(1); 
01106     return ans;
01107 }
01108 
01121 static void
01122 PAWv(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01123       const double *swt, const double *v, int n, int q)
01124 {
01125     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), j, k, p;
01126     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(q, double);
01127     R_CheckStack();
01128 
01129     AZERO(tmp, q);
01130     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01131         double mm = v[j] * (swt ? swt[j] : 1);
01132         for (p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01133             tmp[ai[p]] += mm * ax[p];
01134     }
01135     for (k = 0; k < q; k++)     /* apply P */
01136         dest[k] = tmp[perm ? perm[k] : k];
01137 }
01138 
01153 static void
01154 weighted_XytXy(double *rxy, const double *swt, double *X,
01155                double *y, int n, int p)
01156 {
01157     int i, ione = 1, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01158     double one = 1, zero = 0;
01159     double *Xcp = X, *ycp = y;
01160     
01161     if (swt) {                  /* created weighted copies of X and y */
01162         Xcp = Alloca(n * p, double),
01163         ycp = Alloca(n, double);
01164         R_CheckStack();
01165         
01166         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ycp[i] = swt[i] * y[i];
01167         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01168             for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01169                 Xcp[i + j * n] = swt[i] * X[i + j * n];
01170     }
01171     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &one, Xcp, &n, &zero, rxy, &pp1);
01172     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, &one, Xcp, &n, ycp, &ione, &zero,
01173                     rxy + p * pp1, &ione);
01174     rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1] = F77_CALL(ddot)(&n, ycp, &ione, ycp, &ione);
01175 }
01176         
01184 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01185 {
01186     SEXP RVXyP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym);
01187     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01188     int j, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01189     int pp1 = p + 1;
01190     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01191         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01192         *rvxy = REAL(RVXyP),
01193         *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01194         *swt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtWtSym),
01195         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01196         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01197         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01198     CHM_SP A =
01199         AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, swt ? lme4_ASym : lme4_CmSym));
01200     CHM_DN cRVXy = AS_CHM_DN(RVXyP), ans;
01201     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01202     R_CheckStack();
01203 
01204     update_L(x);
01205                                 /* Evaluate PAW^{1/2}[X:y] in RVXy */
01206     for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01207         PAWv(rvxy + j * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, X + j * n, n, q);
01208     PAWv(rvxy + p * q, (int*)(L->Perm), A, swt, y, n, q);
01209                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01210     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRVXy, &c);
01211     Memcpy(rvxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * pp1);
01212     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01213                                 /* downdate XytXy  */
01214                                 /* Evaluate [X:y]'W[X:y] in RXy */
01215     weighted_XytXy(rxy, swt, X, y, n, p);
01216     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &pp1, &q, mone, rvxy, &q, one, rxy, &pp1);
01217     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &pp1, rxy, &pp1, &j);
01218     if (j)
01219         error(_("Downdated [X:y]'[X:y] is not positive definite, %d."),
01220               j);
01221     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < (pp1 - 1); j++)
01222         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (pp1 + 1)]);
01223     /* update other elements of the deviance slot for LMMs */
01224     if ((!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym))) &&
01225         (!LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym)))) {
01226         d[lpdisc_POS] = 2 * log(rxy[pp1 * pp1 - 1]);
01227         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01228             dn * (1 + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2 * PI / dn));
01229         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01230             dnmp * (1. + d[lpdisc_POS] + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01231     }
01232     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01233 }
01234 
01242 SEXP
01243 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01244 {
01245     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01246 }
01247 
01257 SEXP 
01258 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01259 {
01260     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01261     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01262         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01263     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01264                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym))),
01265         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01266 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe). */
01267     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01268     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01269     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01270     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01271     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01272     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01273         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01274     R_CheckStack();
01275 
01276     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01277     if (!lmm) {
01278         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01279 
01280         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01281         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01282         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01283         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01284     }
01285                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01286     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01287     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01288                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01289     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01290         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01291     }
01292                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01293     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01294         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01295         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01296         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01297     }
01298     do {
01299         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01300         if (lmm)
01301             fx = update_RX(x);
01302         else {
01303             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01304             update_u(x, verb);
01305             mer_update_dev(x);
01306             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01307         }
01308         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01309     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01310     update_RX(x);
01311     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01312     return R_NilValue;
01313 }
01314 
01315 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01316 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01317 
01330 static double
01331 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01332 {
01333     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01334 
01335     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01336         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01337     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01338         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01339         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01340             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01341                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01342             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01343             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01344         }
01345     }
01346     return ans;
01347 }
01348 
01358 SEXP
01359 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01360 {
01361     SEXP ans;
01362     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01363         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01364     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01365 
01366     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01367         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01368     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01369     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01370     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01371     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01372     R_CheckStack();
01373 
01374     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01375     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01376     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01377     if (j)
01378         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01379     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01380     ansp = REAL(ans);
01381     GetRNGstate();
01382     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01383         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01384         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01385         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01386                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01387         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01388                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01389                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01390 
01391         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01392             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01393                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01394     }
01395 
01396     PutRNGstate();
01397     UNPROTECT(1);
01398     return ans;
01399 }
01400 
01401 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01402 
01403 
01412 static void MCMC_betab(SEXP x, double sigma)
01413 {
01414     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01415         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym);
01416     int ione = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01417     int pp1 = p + 1;
01418     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01419     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01420     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01421     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01422     R_CheckStack();
01423 
01424     mer_update_effects(x);
01425                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01426     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01427     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01428                     &pp1, del2, &ione);
01429     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01430                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01431     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01432     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym)),
01433                     &q, del2, &ione, &one, del1, &ione);
01434     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01435     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01436     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01437                                 /* Update the random effects */
01438     TSPp_SEXP_mult(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym), GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01439                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)), uvecP, (int*)(L->Perm));
01440 }
01441 
01442 static void
01443 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01444 {
01445     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01446     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01447         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01448         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01449 
01450     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01451     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01452     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01453     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01454         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01455         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01456         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01457     }
01458 }
01459 
01460 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01461 {
01462     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01463     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01464         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01465     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01466         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01467     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01468     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01469     R_CheckStack();
01470 
01471     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01472     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01473     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01474     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01475     R_CheckStack();
01476     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01477         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01478         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01479         
01480         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01481         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01482                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01483         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01484         else {
01485             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01486             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01487             if (info)
01488                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01489         }
01490                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01491         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01492         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01493                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01494         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01495                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01496         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01497                         &zero, var, &nci);
01498         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01499             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01500         }
01501         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01502             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01503                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01504                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01505                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01506             }
01507         }
01508         if (nci == 1) {
01509             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01510         } else {
01511             double *sti = st[i];
01512 
01513             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01514                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01515                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01516                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01517             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01518             if (info)
01519                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01520             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01521                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01522                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01523                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01524             }
01525         }
01526     }
01527 }
01528 
01542 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01543                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01544 {
01545     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01546     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01547     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01548         n = dims[n_POS], nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01549         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01550         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01551         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01552     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01553         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01554         *ranef = (double*)NULL, df = n - (dims[REML_POS] ? p : 0);
01555     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01556     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01557 
01558     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01559     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01560     ansp = REAL(ans);
01561     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01562     GetRNGstate();
01563     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01564     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01565 
01566     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01567         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01568                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01569         sigma = exp(deviance[lpdisc_POS]/2)/sqrt(rchisq(df));
01570         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01571         mer_update_effects(x);  /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01572         MCMC_betab(x, sigma); /* Updated beta, u and b */
01573         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01574         if (saveb)                                 /* store b */
01575             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01576         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01577 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     /\* Refactor and evaluate deviance *\/ */
01578         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01579         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01580         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01581     }
01582     PutRNGstate();
01583                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01584     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01585 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01586 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01587     UNPROTECT(2);
01588     return ans;
01589 }
01590 
01603 static char
01604 *chkDims(char *buf, int nb, char *nm, SEXP MP, int nr, int nc)
01605 {
01606     int *dd = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) :
01607         (int *)NULL;
01608 
01609     if (!dd) error(_("Argument MP to chkDims is not a matrix"));
01610     buf[0] = '\0';
01611     if (!isReal(MP) || dd[0] != nr || dd[1] != nc)
01612         snprintf(buf, nb, "Matrix %s must be a %d by %d numeric matrix",
01613                 nm, nr, nc);
01614     return buf;
01615 }
01616 
01617 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01618 
01619 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01620 #endif  
01621 
01630 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01631 {
01632     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01633         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01634         XP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym),
01635         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01636         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01637         etaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym),
01638         fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01639         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym),
01640         muP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym),
01641         muEtaP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
01642         offsetP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_offsetSym),
01643         ranefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym),
01644         residP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym),
01645         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uvecSym),
01646         vP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_vSym),
01647         weightsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_priorWtSym),
01648         y = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym);
01649     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01650     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01651         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01652     int neta = n * s;
01653     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01654         C =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01655     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01656     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01657     R_CheckStack();
01658                                 /* check lengths */
01659     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01660         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01661     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01662         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01663     if (LENGTH(y) != n)
01664         return mkString(_("Slot y must have length dims['n']"));
01665     if (LENGTH(muP) != n)
01666         return mkString(_("Slot mu must have length dims['n']"));
01667     if (LENGTH(residP) != n)
01668         return mkString(_("Slot resid must have length dims['n']"));
01669     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01670         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01671     if (LENGTH(fixefP) != p)
01672         return mkString(_("Slot fixef must have length ['p']"));
01673     if (LENGTH(ranefP) != q)
01674         return mkString(_("Slot ranef must have length dims['q']"));
01675     if (LENGTH(uvecP) != q)
01676         return mkString(_("Slot uvec must have length dims['q']"));
01677     if (LENGTH(etaP) != neta)
01678         return mkString(_("Slot eta must have length dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01679     if (LENGTH(weightsP) && LENGTH(weightsP) != n)
01680         return mkString(_("Slot weights must have length 0 or dims['n']"));
01681     if (LENGTH(offsetP) && LENGTH(offsetP) != n)
01682         return mkString(_("Slot offset must have length 0 or dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01683     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01684         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01685         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01686     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01687         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01688         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01689     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01690         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01691     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != neta)
01692         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01693     if (C->nrow != q || C->ncol != neta)
01694         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01695     dd = INTEGER(getAttrib(XP, R_DimSymbol)); 
01696     if (!isReal(XP) || dd[1] != p)
01697         return mkString(_("Slot X must be a numeric matrix with dims['p'] columns"));
01698     if (dd[0] != 0 && dd[0] != (n * s)) /* special case */
01699         return mkString(_("Slot X must be have 0 or dims['n']*dims['s'] rows"));
01700 
01701     nq = 0;
01702     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01703         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01704         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01705         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01706             return
01707                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01708         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01709             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01710         if (!isFactor(fli))
01711             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01712         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01713     }
01714     if (q != nq)
01715         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01716     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RVXy",
01717                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RVXySym), q, p + 1)))
01718         return mkString(buf);
01719     if (strlen(chkDims(buf, (int) BUF_SIZE, "RXy",
01720                        GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym), p + 1, p + 1)))
01721         return mkString(buf);
01722     return ScalarLogical(1);
01723 }
01724 
01725 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01726 
01736 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01737 {
01738     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01739     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01740         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01741         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01742         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01743         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01744     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01745 
01746     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01747     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01748     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01749         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01750         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01751             F[i] = 0;
01752             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01753         } else {
01754             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01755                 F[i] = 0;
01756                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01757             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01758                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01759                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01760                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01761                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01762                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01763                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01764                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01765                             int ii = ai[k];
01766                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01767                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01768                         }
01769                     }
01770                 }
01771             }
01772         }
01773         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01774     }
01775     return ans;
01776 }
01777 
01778 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01791 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01792 {
01793     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01794     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01795     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01796         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01797         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01798     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01799       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01800     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01801         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01802     R_CheckStack();
01803     
01804     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01805     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01806         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01807         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01808         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01809     }
01810     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01811     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01812     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01813     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01814         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01815         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01816                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01817         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01818         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01819             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01820         }
01821         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01822             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01823         }
01824     
01825         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01826         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01827         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01828         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01829             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01830             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01831             if (S) {
01832                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01833                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01834                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01835                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01836                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01837             }
01838             if (D) {
01839                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01840                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01841             }
01842             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01843             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01844             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01845                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01846                                       * evaluated */
01847         } 
01848     }
01849     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01850     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01851     UNPROTECT(1);
01852     return ans;
01853 }
